banner_details:
The banner showcases a high-end jewelry product using a soft, elegant layout with a feminine aesthetic. The design is divided into quadrants with pastel pink backgrounds and abstract textures that highlight visual sophistication. The top left features the brand name (`brand`), product title (`heading`), subtitle (`subheading`), and a tagline (`tagline`). The right half is dedicated to a centered product image (`product_image`) of rose gold earrings, enhancing visual focus. The lower left contains product highlights (`description`), price (`price`), and a prominent call-to-action button (`cta_background`, `cta`). The layout integrates decorative dot and wave elements for visual depth.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Pink (#FFF5F6)
- Light Rose (#FFE4E8)
- Blush Pink (#FFDCE2)
- Deep Rose (#E75A7C)
- Rose Red (#D67B96)
- Mauve (#A3547B)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of elegant earrings that combine soft rose gold and brilliant white rhinestones. The primary color, a luxurious rose gold (#F7A8A6), frames the piece and creates a romantic and feminine tone. The sparkling white crystals (#FFFFFF and #E4E5E8) add brilliance and contrast, giving depth without overpowering the delicate pink tones. The subtle blending of blush pink hues with crystal highlights enhances the product’s elegance while maintaining visual clarity. The advertisement banner could use a soft gradient background blending pastel pink (#FDDCDC), champagne beige (#F9EFEF), and rose gold (#F7A8A6) to mirror the product’s refined and graceful aesthetic.
